name: APEC
description: Apes Coin (APEC) is a utility token designed for the TON blockchain ecosystem. It enables fast, secure transactions, supports decentralized applications, and incentivizes participation in the network. APEC aims to provide seamless integration for developers and users, focusing on scalability, transparency, and community-driven development. The token will be used for transaction fees, governance, staking, and access to premium features within supporting dApps.
